node_info.name: githubTrigger

properties.displayName: Only members with owner privileges for an organization or admin privileges for a repository can set up the webhooks this node requires.
properties.name: notice
events
properties.description: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)

options.description: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)

options.name: Check Run
options.description: Triggered when a check run is created, rerequested, completed, or has a requested_action

options.name: Check Suite
options.description: Triggered when a check suite is completed, requested, or rerequested

options.name: Commit Comment
options.description: Triggered when a commit comment is created

options.name: Create
options.description: Represents a created repository, branch, or tag

options.name: Delete
options.description: Represents a deleted branch or tag

options.name: Deploy Key
options.description: Triggered when a deploy key is added or removed from a repository

options.name: Deployment
options.description: Represents a deployment

options.name: Deployment Status
options.description: Represents a deployment status

options.name: Fork
options.description: Triggered when a user forks a repository

options.name: Github App Authorization
options.description: Triggered when someone revokes their authorization of a GitHub App

options.name: Gollum
options.description: Triggered when a Wiki page is created or updated

options.name: Installation
options.description: Triggered when someone installs (created), uninstalls (deleted), or accepts new permissions (new_permissions_accepted) for a GitHub App. When a GitHub App owner requests new permissions, the person who installed the GitHub App must accept the new permissions request.

options.name: Installation Repositories
options.description: Triggered when a repository is added or removed from an installation

options.name: Issue Comment
options.description: Triggered when an issue comment is created, edited, or deleted

options.name: Issues
options.description: Triggered when an issue is opened, edited, deleted, transferred, pinned, unpinned, closed, reopened, assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, locked, unlocked, milestoned, or demilestoned

options.name: Label
options.description: Triggered when a repository's label is created, edited, or deleted

options.name: Marketplace Purchase
options.description: Triggered when someone purchases a GitHub Marketplace plan, cancels their plan, upgrades their plan (effective immediately), downgrades a plan that remains pending until the end of the billing cycle, or cancels a pending plan change

options.name: Member
options.description: Triggered when a user accepts an invitation or is removed as a collaborator to a repository, or has their permissions changed

options.name: Membership
options.description: Triggered when a user is added or removed from a team. Organization hooks only.

options.name: Meta
options.description: Triggered when the webhook that this event is configured on is deleted

options.name: Milestone
options.description: Triggered when a milestone is created, closed, opened, edited, or deleted

options.name: Org Block
options.description: Triggered when an organization blocks or unblocks a user. Organization hooks only.

options.name: Organization
options.description: Triggered when an organization is deleted and renamed, and when a user is added, removed, or invited to an organization. Organization hooks only.

options.name: Page Build
options.description: Triggered on push to a GitHub Pages enabled branch (gh-pages for project pages, master for user and organization pages)

options.name: Project
options.description: Triggered when a project is created, updated, closed, reopened, or deleted

options.name: Project Card
options.description: Triggered when a project card is created, edited, moved, converted to an issue, or deleted

options.name: Project Column
options.description: Triggered when a project column is created, updated, moved, or deleted

options.name: Public
options.description: Triggered when a private repository is open sourced

options.name: Pull Request
options.description: Triggered when a pull request is assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, opened, edited, closed, reopened, synchronize, ready_for_review, locked, unlocked, a pull request review is requested, or a review request is removed

options.name: Pull Request Review
options.description: Triggered when a pull request review is submitted into a non-pending state, the body is edited, or the review is dismissed

options.name: Pull Request Review Comment
options.description: Triggered when a comment on a pull request's unified diff is created, edited, or deleted (in the Files Changed tab)

options.name: Push
options.description: Triggered on a push to a repository branch. Branch pushes and repository tag pushes also trigger webhook push events. This is the default event.

options.name: Release
options.description: Triggered when a release is published, unpublished, created, edited, deleted, or prereleased

options.name: Repository
options.description: Triggered when a repository is created, archived, unarchived, renamed, edited, transferred, made public, or made private. Organization hooks are also triggered when a repository is deleted.

options.name: Repository Import
options.description: Triggered when a successful, cancelled, or failed repository import finishes for a GitHub organization or a personal repository

options.name: Repository Vulnerability Alert
options.description: Triggered when a security alert is created, dismissed, or resolved

options.name: Security Advisory
options.description: Triggered when a new security advisory is published, updated, or withdrawn

options.name: Star
options.description: Triggered when a star is added or removed from a repository

options.name: Status
options.description: Triggered when the status of a Git commit changes

options.name: Team
options.description: Triggered when an organization's team is created, deleted, edited, added_to_repository, or removed_from_repository. Organization hooks only.

options.name: Team Add
options.description: Triggered when a repository is added to a team

options.name: Watch
options.description: Triggered when someone stars a repository

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the SSL certificate of the n8n host be verified by GitHub when delivering payloads

options.name: insecureSSL
options.description: Whether the SSL certificate of the n8n host be verified by GitHub when delivering payloads
